Title: The Gratitude of Stoneplow
Description:
One last thing, $n. Don't worry, it's not another favor. You've killed enough mantid today.

We recently received a shipment of high-quality armor from Kun-Lai Summit. I was planning to keep them for my men... but I can't think of anybody more deserving than you. You'll find them on the second floor of the inn, here in town.
ObjectivesText: Find the Commander's Cache and collect your reward.
